title: Injury Update & Movement in the AP Top 25
description:
Wendi Nix, Greg McElroy, and Joey Galloway bring in Pete Thamel to take a deeper look into the AP's Top 25 Rankings after week 1. Plus, which teams have players out for the season with injuries? Also, McElroy and Galloway discuss what Clemson should do about their quarterback situation.

itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB LIVE: The crew's reactions at AP's Top 25 Ranking after week 1 and discusses injuries
